page.title: 07Colvend: Employment
page.content: Around this area there are at least five farms so a few people work on farms.There is usually a dairyman and two other farmworkers.There is a shop and filling station which has created three jobs. Twenty-two people work at the Baron's Craig Hotel but it is only open from Easter till October. A lot of people work in Dalbeattie which is about five miles away and Dumfries which is about twenty miles away. There is one teacher for the school.One lady does the cleaning of the school and there is a dinner lady. There is a milkman who delivers milk in the morning. He also gives people a "Courier"newspaper on Saturdays.Some people here are retired and old.
